affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Hurls a poisoned dagger which deals large initial damage, and then deals damage over time. The poisoned unit has its movement speed slowed for 15 seconds.  An instance of damage is dealt every 3 seconds.
notes:
The affected unit slowly regains its original movement speed every second during the duration.
Units afflicted by Shadow Strike can be denied by their allies when their HP drops below 25% of their maximum health.
attrib:
INITIAL DAMAGE: 50/75/100/125
DAMAGE PER TICK: 30/40/50/60
MOVEMENT SLOW: 20%/30%/40%/50%
CAST RANGE: 450/475/500/525
DURATION: 15
cmb:
110
16/12/8/4
lore: Akasha's envenomed dagger allows her to delight in the drawn out suffering of her victims.
name: queenofpain_shadow_strike

desc: Short distance teleportation that allows Queen of Pain to move in and out of combat.
notes: You can use Blink to dodge incoming projectiles.
cmb:
60/60/60/60
15/12/9/6
lore: The Secret Queen lives up to her title, making her pain impossible to escape.
name: queenofpain_blink

affects:
ABILITY: No Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: The Queen of Pain lets loose a piercing scream around her, damaging nearby enemies.
notes:
Scream Of Pain will hit invisible units.
Scream Of Pain cannot be disjointed.
cmb:
110/120/130/140
7
lore: The sultry voice of Akasha beckons her opponents while stealing their souls.
name: queenofpain_scream_of_pain

affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Pure
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc:
Creates a gigantic wave of sound in front of Queen of Pain, dealing heavy damage to all enemy units in its wake.
Upgradable with Aghanim's Scepter.
notes: Sonic Wave can hit units up to 1350 units away.
attrib:
WAVE MAX RADIUS: 450
DAMAGE: 290/390/490
SCEPTER COOLDOWN: 40
SCEPTER DAMAGE: 325/450/575
cmb:
250/360/500
135
lore: Her most exquisite of all of torments, Akasha's Sonic Wave puts her poor foes out of their misery.
name: queenofpain_sonic_wave
